option3.name: SUTCKSEL
option3.desc: Select Startup Time and Clock Source

entry.txt: [CKSEL=10 SUT=00] Ceramic res., fast rising power, 14 CK + 4.1 ms
[CKSEL=10 SUT=01] Ceramic res., slowly rising power, 14 CK + 65 ms
[CKSEL=10 SUT=10] Ceramic res., BOD enabled, 14 CK
[CKSEL=10 SUT=11] Ceramic res., fast rising power, 14 CK + 4.1 ms
[CKSEL=11 SUT=00] Ceramic res., slowly rising power, 14 CK + 65 ms
[CKSEL=11 SUT=01] Crystal Osc., BOD enabled, 14 CK
[CKSEL=11 SUT=10] Crystal Osc., fast rising power, 14 CK + 4.1 ms
[CKSEL=11 SUT=11] Crystal Osc., slowly rising power, 14 CK + 65 ms
[CKSEL=00 SUT=00] Ext. Clock, BOD enabled, 14 CK
[CKSEL=00 SUT=01] Ext. Clock, fast rising power, 14 CK + 4.1 ms
[CKSEL=00 SUT=10] Ext. Clock, slowly rising power, 14 CK + 65 ms
[CKSEL=01 SUT=00] Ext. Clock, BOD enabled, 14 CK
[CKSEL=01 SUT=01] Ext. Clock, fast rising power, 14 CK + 4.1 ms
[CKSEL=01 SUT=10] Ext. Clock, slowly rising power, 14 CK + 65 ms

option9.name: EESAVE
option9.desc: Preserve EEPROM through the Chip Erase cycle

entry.txt: Boot Flash size=512 words Boot start address=$7E00
Boot Flash size=1024 words Boot address=$7C00
Boot Flash size=2048 words Boot address=$7800
Boot Flash size=4096 words Boot address=$7000
Brown-out detection enabled
